name: Rainbow Rage Squad
description:
Rage it up!!!!!!!!!!
Rainbow Rage Squad is a platforming, wall jumping, saw dodging, game that includes 3 modes – Adventure, Time Attack, and Battle Mode. 40 levels full of insane obstacles, mayhem, and terrible level design as you make your way thru 4 total bosses....You will Rage!!!!!!

Features

Up to 4 players Local
Local Co-Op
Time Trials
Battle Mode
40 Levels
Boss Fights
Unlockables
Rage, and Rainbows!!!!


GAMEPADS / CONTROLLERS RECOMMEND - This game is Designed for play with the Xbox 360 / Xbox One controller and some others do work. Keyboard is possible but not too enjoyable.
